async_info.video_title: Queen's Speech: The Crown arrives - BBC News
async_info.video_description:
Outside Parliament, the regalia procession is taking place.
The Queen Alexandra State coach, built in 1865, has brought the crown, the cap of maintenance and the sword of state to the Palace of Westminster.
These items are normally kept in the Tower of London, but were transferred to Buckingham Palace overnight until being brought to Westminster this morning.
Please subscribe HERE http://bit.ly/1rbfUog

No monarch or person is above the law. Even those people that live in a communist country where the dictator rules, is not above the law.
Monarch's, President's and Chancellor's are no different to that of Police and the judiciary system, all of which represent the law for us citizens to follow.
